subject: Flock Safety Case # 01086897
body:
You don't often get email from donotreply@flocksafety.com. Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  
	

[EXTERNAL ?]

Thank you for contacting Flock Safety Support. We have received your email and opened a support case # 01086897 for you.

A support team member will review your request and respond within 48 business hours (Monday-Friday, 8 AM - 8 PM EST).

For urgent assistance, please visit our Help Center https://help.flocksafety.com/  or call us at 1-866-901-1781 during business hours and reference the case number above for immediate support.

Stay safe,
Flock Safety Support


Original Message:

All our Admins are receiving the below message for each new user. We have about 150 people that will be going live over the next week. Can we get these notices disabled please.

Additionally, we are getting Flock Safety Daily Digest emails sent to our chief and city manager. They can be removed from these daily emails. Specifically, Skinner and Medary.

Derek

Detective D. DeWitt
Financial Crimes Unit
Special Weapons and Tactics Team
Background Investigations Team
Eugene Police Department
300 County Club Road
Eugene, OR 97401
Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.
Desk Phone � 541-682-2682
Work Cell � 541-743-6192

[cid:image001.png@01DBD474.09CB12C0]

From: hello=flocksafety.com@mail.flocksafety.com <hello=flocksafety.com@mail.flocksafety.com> On Behalf Of hello@flocksafety.com
Sent: Monday, June 2, 2025 9:52 AM
To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov>
Subject: New User Linked to Existing User using Single-Sign-On


[EXTERNAL ?]

[Flock Safety]



Welcome to the Flock

A existing Flock user in your organization has connected to single sign on. Please review the following details.
Name: HANNEMAN Brad A
Email: BHanneman@eugene-or.govBHanneman@eugene-or.gov
Role: Street Crimes

Problems or questions?

[https://flock-public-assets.s3.amazonaws.com/envelope-solid.png]support@flocksafety.com

support@flocksafety.comsupport@flocksafety.com

[https://flock-public-assets.s3.amazonaws.com/phone-solid.png]support@flocksafety.com

+1 (866) 901-1781<tel:866-901-1781>




To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to support+unsubscribe@flocksafety.com.  <https://flocksafety.my.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?oid=00D6g000003tehf&esid=018Pi00000lckd8&from=ext>
